content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: gray_banner
inventory=[{"type": "birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "piston", "quantity": 6, "index": 17}, {"type": "black_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 47, "index": 20}, {"type": "light_gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 26, "index": 21}, {"type": "acacia_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "podzol", "quantity": 49, "index": 28}, {"type": "piglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 25, "index": 30}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "gray_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 34}, {"type": "item_frame", "quantity": 32, "index": 36}, {"type": "birch_fence_gate", "quantity": 5, "index": 40}]

thought: To craft a gray_banner, I first need to craft birch_planks. To craft birch_planks, I need to place a birch_log in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the birch_log from slot 16 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
